public static function toString(obj: Object = null,
delimiter: String = '\n'):String
Convert the object to a string of form: PROP: VAL&PROP: VAL where: - PROP is a property - VAL is its corresponding value - & is the specified optional delimiter Original article: http://jacksondunstan.com/articles/509
